Model.BugReport

Class BugReportService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.BugReport.BugReportService

  • public class BugReportService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing services for bug reports. Contains methods to provide requested bug reports, visible by the requesting user. Contains methods to create bug reports. Also contains methods to create comments and add them to bug reports or comments.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BugReportService(ProjectService projectService)
      Constructor for the bugReport service.

                          BugReport dependency)
                   throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to add a new dependency to a bug report.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - the bug report to which the new dependency has to be added
        dependency - the new dependency to be added to the specified bug report
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown when an invalid dependency has been selected.

      • canAddPatch

        public boolean canAddPatch(User user,
                           BugReport bugReport)
        Method determining whether a user is allowed to add a patch to a specified bug report.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that wants to add a patch
        bugReport - the bug report that the user wants to add the patch to
        Returns:
        true if the user is a developer and assigned as programmer, false if not.

      • canAddTest

        public boolean canAddTest(User user,
                          BugReport bugReport)
        Method determining whether a user is allowed to add a test to a specified bug report.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that wants to add a test
        bugReport - the bug report that the user wants to add the test to
        Returns:
        true if the user is a developer and assigned as tester, false if not.

      • canUpdateTargetMilestone

        public boolean canUpdateTargetMilestone(BugReport bugReport,
                                        TargetMilestone milestone)
        Method to check if the given milestone can be assigned to the given bugreport.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bugreport to assign the milestone to.
        milestone - The milestone to check.
        Returns:
        True if the milestone is greater than the milestones of the subsystems to which this bugreport belongs.

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 Issuer creator,
                                 SubSystem subSystem,
                                 boolean pblc,
                                 int impactFactor)
                          throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Function to create a new BugReport and add the bug report to the list of bugreports.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the bug report
        description - The description of the bug report
        creator - The creator of the bug report
        subSystem - The subsystem of the bug report
        pblc - The access right of the bug report.
        impactFactor - A score between 1 and 5 to show the impact of the bug.
        Returns:
        The newly created bug report
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - the title or description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the creator or subsystem is null.

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 Issuer creator,
                                 SubSystem subSystem,
                                 boolean pblc,
                                 TheDate creationDate,
                                 java.util.List<Developer> initialAssignees,
                                 int impactFactor)
                          throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Function to create a new BugReport and add the bug report to the list of bugreports. Van de gebruiker van deze functie wordt verwacht dat de initialAssignies ook developers van het project zijn. Anders zullen tag assignment rechten voor deze gebruiker geweigerd worden.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the bug report
        description - The description of the bug report
        creator - The creator of the bug report
        subSystem - The subsystem of the bug report
        creationDate - The creation date of the bug report
        initialAssignees - The list of initialAssignies van de bug report
        pblc - The access right of the bug report.
        impactFactor - A score between 1 and 5 to show the impact of the bug.
        Returns:
        The newly created bug report
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - the given title of description is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The subsystem, creator, creationdata or tag is null.

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(java.lang.String text,
                             Issuer issuer,
                             BugReport bugReport)
                      throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method for creating a comment and adding it to the list of comments of the bug report.
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the comment.
        issuer - The issuer writing the comment.
        bugReport - The bug report on which the issuer commented.
        Returns:
        The newly created comment.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - One of the given arguments are illegal. See constructor of comment for rules.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - BugReport is null.

      • createPatch

        public Patch createPatch(java.lang.String text,
                         User user,
                         BugReport bugReport)
                  throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method used to create and return a new Patch object. The newly created patch is added to the patch list of the specified bug report.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the new patch
        user - the user that wants to add the new patch
        bugReport - the bug report that the patch has to be added to
        Returns:
        the new patch object as created by this method.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown if the user has not the rights to add a new patch to the bug report.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - BugReport is null.

      • getOneBugReport

        public BugReport getOneBugReport(BugReportID id,
                                 User user)
                          throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Getter to get one specific BugReport.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the BugReport to get
        user - The user requesting the bug report.
        Returns:
        The BugReport matching the given id
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - thrown when no bug report is found. or bug report cannot be seen by user.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - User or bugreportId is null.

      • isValidDependency

        public boolean isValidDependency(BugReport bugReport,
                                 BugReport dependency)
        Method to check the constraints for the dependency: The dependency should be a bug report of the same project.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - the bug report to which the dependency needs to be added
        dependency - the dependency that has to be added to the specified bug report
        Returns:
        true if the dependency is a bug report of the same project as the specified bug report false if otherwise

      • isVisibleByUser

        public boolean isVisibleByUser(User user,
                               BugReport bugReport)
        Method to determine whether a bug report is visible to a certain user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to see a certain bug report
        bugReport - The bug report that wants to be looked up by the specified user
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to see the bug report, false if not

      • setTargetMilestone

        public void setTargetMilestone(BugReport bugReport,
                               TargetMilestone milestone)
                        throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to set the Target milestone of a bug report.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to set the target milestone of.
        milestone - The milestone to set to the bug report.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - is thrown when the new target milestone is not greater than all the subsystems' milestones.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Bugreport or milestone is null.
